body:
Anyone think the return of the canuck_pro should happen, or nah? Just keep this name? just wondering.. 

Please don't count this as spam.. I'm just trying to see what everyone thinks ;)
body_tagged:

title: Should I or not? Return of Canuck?

replies.body:
I like SenorSombrero :) Makes it look cool, and if spanish letters are possible in minecraft it would look 100000000000x better :)

But it is your choice in the end! :)

Good luck on your choosing! :)

replies.body: Man, these name changes are confusing. Id keep it, I like it better anyways. And, well I'd never notice you again if you change it xD

replies.body: ok then Sombrero is staying aqui!
